description: A small shop nestled in a lush garden, run by the eccentric botanist Beau. Specializes in plants, flowers, and nature-related items.
_distance_help: Abstract travel distance 1 (nearby) to 10 (very far). Farther towns add a price premium.
_type_help: One of: VILLAGE, TOWN, CITY, MARKET, OUTPOST. Affects price bias of listings.
_level_help: Minimum trader level (1-5) before this town appears in the list.
_sells_help: Items this town lists on the Market Board. Use full registry IDs.
_needLevels_help: Demand level per item. Options: DESPERATE (2x), HIGH_NEED (1.5x), MODERATE_NEED (1.25x), BALANCED (1x, default), SURPLUS (0.75x), OVERSATURATED (0.5x). Items not listed default to BALANCED.
_letters_help: Letters Beau may send to the player on specific events.

shipment_received.subject: Your plants arrived in one piece!
shipment_received.body:
Ah, {player}!

The delivery just came in and everything is looking wonderfully alive. The wither roses especially — exceptional specimens. You clearly know how to handle delicate flora.

Do keep them coming,
Beau

shipment_received.subject: Shipment received - mostly intact
shipment_received.body:
Hello {player},

Got your shipment. The bone meal was a touch clumpy but perfectly usable. All accounted for.

Cheers,
Beau

shipment_received.subject: Oh, a surprise delivery!
shipment_received.body:
Dear {player},

I was just repotting my azaleas when your goods arrived. Wonderful timing — I was nearly out of stock!

Gratefully,
Beau

first_trade.subject: A new trader at my door!
first_trade.body:
{player}!

Word reaches me of a new trader in the region — and they've come to me first! Smart.

I am Beau, proprietor of the finest botanical emporium this side of the forest. I deal in all manner of growing things: flowers, mosses, saplings, and the occasional dangerous specimen.

Bring me what grows and I shall make it worth your while.

Yours in horticulture,
Beau

quest_complete.subject: Well done on the delivery!
quest_complete.body:
Dear {player},

The {item} arrived in excellent condition — exactly what I needed. A pleasure doing business with someone who respects the cargo.

I'll have more work for you soon, no doubt.

Until then,
Beau

quest_complete.subject: Quest complete!
quest_complete.body:
{player},

Quest fulfilled. The plants are safe, the shop is happy, and I can return to my experiments.

My gratitude,
Beau

quest_expired.subject: That window has closed...
quest_expired.body:
Hello {player},

I'm afraid the season for that particular request has passed. The spore blossom won't keep forever, you know.

Perhaps next time? I still value our arrangement.

- Beau

reputation_increase.subject: You're becoming a favourite around here
reputation_increase.body:
Hello {player},

I don't know what you've been up to, but the garden folk are impressed. Even old Maren the moss farmer mentioned you by name.

Keep it up,
Beau

reputation_decrease.subject: A concern has been raised...
reputation_decrease.body:
{player},

I'll be frank — some of my regulars have raised an eyebrow at your recent dealings. I'm sure it's nothing serious, but perhaps take a moment to smooth things over?

I do hope we can continue our arrangement.

- Beau

diplomat_proposed.subject: A proposition from the garden
diplomat_proposed.body:
Dear {player},

I've sent my most trusted envoy your way with a proposal. Take your time — but not too much time. Good deals, like blossoms, don't last forever.

Eagerly,
Beau
